about_the_game:
Flashback to old school bass fishing with the Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pack. Celebrate the early days of Bassmaster® and kit your angler & boat out with vintage Bassmaster® colours & designs that include original badge patches.

Celebrate old school B.A.S.S.® with traditional Bassmaster® jacket colours, your new boat wrap also comes fitted with light strips so you can standout when showing off your original Bassmaster® patches.

Complete the Throwback set by wearing the new zip up Jacket, Pants, and Sneakers! This pack also comes with a full set of exclusive Mastery Challenges to unlock the Throwback Cap that has the 25th anniversary Bassmaster Classic® Badge.

Flashback to old school B.A.S.S.® with:


- Zip up jacket with traditional Bassmaster® Patches
- Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pants
- Cap with 25th anniversary styled B.A.S.S.® patch
- Boat wrap featuring a variety of classical B.A.S.S.® logos
- New sneaker colours to finish the set
- Mastery challenges for you to take on

Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass


Want more Retro styled cosmetics? Pick up the Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass today and get access to 3 great new cosmetic packs.

- Synthwave Pack
- Pixel Pro Pack
- Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pack

Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave boat wrap, pick your Pixel Pro with the new pixel art Elite anglers, or flashback to old school Bassmaster® with the Throwback B.A.S.S.® pack and kit your angler & boat out with vintage patches from the early days of Bassmaster®.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2Gb dedicated video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Flashback to old school bass fishing with the Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pack. Celebrate the early days of Bassmaster® and kit your angler & boat out with vintage Bassmaster® colours, designs, and clothing that include original badge patches.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
